snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said episodes of misconduct by some troops in Afghanistan had damaged the chances for battlefield success.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said episodes of misconduct by some troops in Afghanistan had damaged the chances for battlefield success.

headline.main: Leon Panetta Warns Military Over Cases of Misconduct
